DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to investigate the safety and tolerability of fesoterodine following once daily long-term treatment in Japanese pediatric neurogenic detrusor overactivity (NDO) subjects.
DOC.brief_title: Open-label Long-term Extension Study of Fesoterodine in Japanese Subjects With Neurogenic Detrusor Overactivity.
DOC.detailed_description: This is a Phase 3, multi-center, open-label long-term extension study in Japanese NDO subjects who participated and completed in the precedent Study A0221047 which is a 24 weeks, randomized, open label study, to investigate the safety and tolerability of fesoterodine. This study consists of a 28-week open-label treatment period followed by a 4-week follow-up. In addition, subjects in the oxybutynin arm of the precedent Study A0221047 will continue the fesoterodine treatment until Week 40 visit in this study, in order to obtain fesoterodine 1 year treatment data.
